com.jbion.utils.xml.serialization.serializers

Class Serializer<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jbion.utils.xml.serialization.serializers.Serializer<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type managed by this serializer.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArraySerializer, ObjectSerializer, SimpleSerializer

    public abstract class Serializer<T>
extends Object
    An XML serializer for the class given to the constructor, which also corresponds to the type variable of this generic class.

    This base abstract class is already subclassed into SimpleSerializers and ArraySerializers for some basic classes. These anonymous subclasses are instantiated in the public fields of this class. In particular, there are Serializers for every primitive type wrapper class, and the corresponding array classes.

    This class should not be directly subclassed. To create your own Serializer, extending either ObjectSerializer, SimpleSerializer or ArraySerializer should be sufficient.

    Author:
    Joffrey Bion
    See Also:
    SimpleSerializer, ArraySerializer
